import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styles: [ ] }) export class HomeComponent { constructor() { } }

Hi, I'm Allen Firth.

I’m a software architect / developer with a passion for building things with code.

Intro

I’ve been developing applications for over two decades now. The tools of my trade being C#, Angular / React, relational or document databases, Git, Microsoft Azure & Azure DevOps.

I’ve worked for small startups and I’ve worked for global multi-national corporations. As I said I like building things.

I’ve got a Bachelors Degree in Informatics from the University of South Africa (2004) as well as being certified as a Microsoft Certified Solutions Developer since 2000.

About Skills Experience Contact CV
